author: Garrey Dawson
method: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat and gently fry the onion, garlic and chilli for 2-3 minutes until softened. Add the stock and bring to the boil, then reduce the heat until the mixture is simmering. Add the spinach, stir well and simmer for 2-3 minutes.  Transfer the soup to a food processor and blend until smooth. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, pour the soup into a bowl and drizzle with the cream.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ onion, peeled, chopped,  1 garlic clove, peeled, finely chopped,  ½ red chilli, chopped,  500ml/18fl oz chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetarian stock),  2 handfuls spinach leaves, washed,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  2 tbsp double cream, to serve
